# iosxe_mld_snooping (Data Source)

This data source can read the MLD Snooping configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_mld_snooping" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `querier` (Boolean) MLD querier disable/enable
- `snooping` (Boolean) Global MLD Snooping enable for Catalyst Vlans
